typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		SalesOrderDetailID as integer,
		OrderQty as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		UnitPriceDiscount as decimal(19,4),
		LineTotal as decimal(38,6),
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Sales
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ProductOriginal
Sales select(mapColumn(
		SalesOrderDetailID,
		OrderQty,
		ProductID,
		UnitPrice,
		UnitPriceDiscount,
		LineTotal
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SaalesSelectC
SaalesSelectC aggregate(groupBy(ProductID),
	UnitPrice = count(UnitPrice)) ~> SummarizebyProduct
SalesSelfJoin, ProductOriginal join(SummarizebyProduct@ProductID == ProductOriginal@ProductID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> SalesProduct
SummarizebyProduct, SaalesSelectC join(SummarizebyProduct@ProductID == SaalesSelectC@ProductID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> SalesSelfJoin
SalesProduct select(mapColumn(
		ProductID = {SummarizebyProduct@ProductID},
		UnitPrice = {SummarizebyProduct@UnitPrice},
		SalesOrderDetailID,
		OrderQty,
		ProductID = {SaalesSelectC@ProductID},
		UnitPrice = {SaalesSelectC@UnitPrice},
		UnitPriceDiscount,
		LineTotal,
		ProductID = {ProductOriginal@ProductID},
		Name,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice,
		Size
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> InternetSales
